verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> which came to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that Nebuzaradan <S%H5018><s%> the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> had let him go <S%H7971><s%> from Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> when he had taken <S%H3947><s%> him being bound <S%H631><s%> in chains <S%H246><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> all the captives <S%H1546><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> who were carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H935><s%> it, <S%H6213><s%> and done according as he spoke: <S%H1696><s%> because you have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> therefore this thing has come on you. <S%H1697><s%>

Now, <S%H6605><s%> behold, I release you this day <S%H3117><s%> from the chains <S%H246><s%> which are on your hand. <S%H3027><s%> If it seems good <S%H2896><s%> to you to come <S%H935><s%> with me into Babylon, <S%H894><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> and I will take care <S%H7760><s%> of you; <S%H7489><s%> but if it seems bad to you to come <S%H935><s%> with me into Babylon, <S%H894><s%> don <S%H2308><s%>'t: behold, <S%H7200><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H413><s%> where it seems good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> to you to go, <S%H3212><s%> there go. <S%H3212><s%>

Now while he had not yet gone back, <S%H7725><s%> Go back <S%H7725><s%> then, <S%H1436><s%> he said, to Gedaliah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam, <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> whom the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> has made governor <S%H6485><s%> over the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> or go <S%H3212><s%> wherever it seems right <S%H3477><s%> to you to go. <S%H3212><s%> So the captain <S%H7227><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> him food <S%H737><s%> and a present, <S%H4864><s%> and let him go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then went <S%H935><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> to Mizpah, <S%H4708><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> with him among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who were left <S%H7604><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

Now when all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> who were in the fields, <S%H7704><s%> even they and their men, <S%H582><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had made Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> governor <S%H6485><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and had committed <S%H6485><s%> to him men, <S%H582><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> and children, <S%H2945><s%> and of the poorest <S%H1803><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> of those who were not carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon; <S%H894><s%>

then they came <S%H935><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> to Mizpah, <S%H4708><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and Johanan <S%H3110><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3129><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Tanhumeth, <S%H8576><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephai <S%H5778><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> and Jezaniah <S%H3153><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Maacathite, <S%H4602><s%> they and their men. <S%H582><s%>

Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to them and to their men, <S%H582><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Chaldeans: <S%H3778><s%> dwell in <S%H3427><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and it shall be well with you. <S%H3190><s%>

As for me, <S%H3427><s%> behold, I will dwell at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> who shall come <S%H935><s%> to us: <S%H622><s%> but you, gather wine <S%H3196><s%> and summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and oil, <S%H8081><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> them in your vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> that you have taken. <S%H8610><s%>

Likewise when all the Jews <S%H3064><s%> who were in Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and among the children of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and in Edom, <S%H123><s%> and who were in all the countries, <S%H776><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had left <S%H5414><s%> a remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and that he had set <S%H6485><s%> over them Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam, <S%H296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan; <S%H8227><s%>

then all the Jews <S%H3064><s%> returned out <S%H7725><s%> of all places <S%H4725><s%> where they were driven, <S%H5080><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to Gedaliah, <S%H1436><s%> to Mizpah, <S%H4708><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> and summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> much. <S%H7235><s%>

Moreover Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> and all the captains <S%H8269><s%> of the forces <S%H2428><s%> who were in the fields, <S%H7704><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> to Mizpah, <S%H4708><s%>

and said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3045><s%> Do you know <S%H3045><s%> that Baalis <S%H1185><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children of Ammon <S%H1121><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah <S%H5418><s%> to take <S%H5221><s%> your life? <S%H1436><s%> But Gedaliah the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> didn't <S%H539><s%> believe them.

Then Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah <S%H7143><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> in Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> secretly, <S%H5643><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Please let me go, <S%H3212><s%> and I will kill <S%H5221><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethaniah, <S%H5418><s%> and no man <S%H376><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> it: <S%H5221><s%> why should he take your life, <S%H3064><s%> that all the Jews who are gathered <S%H6908><s%> to you should be scattered, <S%H6327><s%> and the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> perish? <S%H6><s%>

But Gedaliah <S%H1436><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahikam <S%H296><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kareah, <S%H7143><s%> You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> this thing; <S%H1697><s%> for you speak <S%H1696><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> of Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>
